name: 404 Escape Not Found
description:
Lite Roguelike lite, now with more light! (Dark version) 

Explore this massive procedural dungeon crawler and collect all of the nearly 3 Million items!

What glory awaits those who find them all? 

arrow keys/WASD - movement

Mouseover to check collected items.

(If you're reading this, and collect all the chests, send me a screenshot. I will be thoroughly impressed)
